page.title: 08Shopping
page.content: When you live in the country you have to travel quite a long way to get to a superstore or supermarket. Our nearest small supermarkets are at Winchombe,Bourton on the Water or Stow on the Wold all of which are about seven miles away. Most people prefer to travel to these shops for most of their shopping and only occasionally use the local shop (which isn't in our block) for things which they have run out of. We do have daily newspapers,3 times weekly deliveries of milk and vans delivering coal,bread, meat and fish. We have to travel 15 miles to Cheltenham to buy clothes and furniture and so a car is an essential living in the country.
